generative-ai.title: Generative AI
generative-ai.tagline: Transform operations and experiences with AI
generative-ai.description: We help businesses leverage generative AI for automation, content, customer service, and decision support. From strategy and model selection to integration and governance, we deliver production-ready AI solutions.
outcomes: Customer service automation reduced handling time by 50%.
Internal knowledge base now answers 80% of staff queries via AI.
Content pipeline cut manual drafting time by 70%.
generative-ai.caseStudyTitle: How Generative AI is Transforming Business Operations

dynamics-365-erp.title: Dynamics 365 ERP
dynamics-365-erp.description: We implement and extend Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP to unify finance, supply chain, and operations. From greenfield rollout to upgrades and integrations, we deliver on time and on budget.
outcomes: Single source of truth across 12 entities in 6 months.
Order-to-cash cycle reduced by 40%.
Month-end close cut from 10 days to 3.

mobile-app.title: Mobile App Development
mobile-app.tagline: Native and cross-platform apps that users love
mobile-app.description: We build iOS and Android apps — native or cross-platform (React Native, Flutter) — with a focus on performance, UX, and scalability. From MVP to enterprise, we ship on time.
outcomes: Consumer app reached 1M+ downloads in first year.
B2B app reduced field reporting time by 60%.
Healthcare app HIPAA-compliant and used by 50K+ patients.
mobile-app.caseStudyTitle: Trends of Mobile Design: What's Next for Your Business?

staff-augmentation.title: Staff Augmentation
staff-augmentation.tagline: Scale your team with vetted talent
staff-augmentation.description: Add developers, designers, and QA engineers to your team without the overhead of hiring. We match you with pre-vetted professionals who integrate seamlessly and deliver from day one.
outcomes: Startup scaled dev capacity 3x in 8 weeks.
Enterprise filled 15 specialized roles in 30 days.
Client retained same augmented team for 3+ years.
staff-augmentation.caseStudyTitle: Scale your team without the hiring headache

devops.title: DevOps
devops.description: We design and implement DevOps practices and tooling: CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, container orchestration, and observability. Ship faster and more reliably.
outcomes: Deployments increased from weekly to multiple per day.
Mean time to recovery reduced by 70%.
Infrastructure fully reproducible and documented.
devops.caseStudyTitle: From weekly releases to multiple deploys per day

ui-ux.title: UI/UX Design
ui-ux.description: We create intuitive, accessible, and visually compelling experiences for web and mobile. From research and wireframes to high-fidelity UI and design systems, we align design with your business goals.
outcomes: Redesigned app increased conversion by 35%.
Design system cut design-dev handoff time by 50%.
Accessibility audit and fixes achieved WCAG 2.1 AA.

web-development.title: Web Development
web-development.tagline: Custom web applications and responsive sites
web-development.description: We build fast, scalable web applications and websites using modern stacks (React, Next.js, Vue, .NET, Node). From marketing sites to complex web apps, we deliver quality and performance.
outcomes: Custom Web Application Development: Everything You Need to Know — see our blog.
E-commerce site handled 5x traffic during peak with no downtime.
Portal reduced manual processing time by 60%.
web-development.caseStudyTitle: Custom Web Application Development: Everything You Need to Know

custom-software.title: Custom Software Development
custom-software.description: When off-the-shelf doesn't fit, we build custom software: internal tools, workflows, integrations, and platforms. We focus on requirements, architecture, and long-term maintainability.
outcomes: Custom platform replaced 4 legacy systems and cut licensing costs 40%.
Workflow automation saved 20 hours per week per team.
New product launched from idea to production in 12 weeks.
custom-software.caseStudyTitle: From idea to production in 12 weeks

cybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.description: We help organizations strengthen security posture through assessments, secure development practices, and compliance support. From penetration testing to DevSecOps, we reduce risk.
outcomes: Vulnerability assessment led to critical fixes before launch.
SOC 2 Type II achieved with our guidance in 6 months.
DevSecOps pipeline blocked 100+ issues in first quarter.

data-analytics.title: Data Analytics & Insights
data-analytics.description: We design and build data pipelines, warehouses, and analytics solutions. From dashboards and reporting to ML-driven insights, we help you make data-driven decisions at scale.
outcomes: Unified data platform replaced 15+ spreadsheets; reporting time cut 80%.
Predictive model improved demand forecasting accuracy by 25%.
Real-time dashboard reduced operational response time by 50%.
data-analytics.caseStudyTitle: Unified data platform cut reporting time by 80%

d365-crm.title: MS D365 CRM
d365-crm.description: We implement and extend Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement (Sales, Customer Service, Marketing) to unify customer data and streamline sales and service processes.
outcomes: Single customer view across sales, service, and marketing.
Lead-to-opportunity conversion improved by 30%.
Case resolution time reduced by 40% with automation.
d365-crm.caseStudyTitle: Single customer view across sales and service

power-apps.title: Power Apps
power-apps.description: We build canvas and model-driven apps, flows, and chatbots with Microsoft Power Platform. Rapid delivery for internal tools, approvals, and process automation without sacrificing governance.
outcomes: Field inspection app replaced paper; 500+ users in 2 months.
Approval workflows cut processing time by 60%.
Self-service portal reduced IT tickets by 40%.
power-apps.caseStudyTitle: Field inspection app: 500+ users in 2 months

cloud-application.title: Cloud Application
cloud-application.description: We design and build applications for AWS, Azure, and GCP — serverless, containers, and managed services. We focus on scalability, resilience, and cost efficiency.
outcomes: Cloud-native app scaled to 10x traffic with no code changes.
Serverless migration cut infrastructure cost by 50%.
Multi-region deployment achieved 99.99% uptime.
cloud-application.caseStudyTitle: How Cloud Computing Can Transform Small Businesses

cloud-maintenance.title: Cloud Maintenance & Integration
cloud-maintenance.description: We keep your cloud workloads running smoothly: monitoring, patching, cost management, and third-party integrations. Proactive support so you can focus on product.
outcomes: Unplanned downtime reduced to near zero with proactive monitoring.
Integration backlog cleared; 8 systems now connected.
Cloud spend optimized; 25% savings without cutting performance.

metaverse.title: Metaverse
metaverse.description: We create metaverse-style experiences: virtual events, showrooms, training environments, and branded spaces. From concept to deployment, we use real-time 3D and XR tech.
outcomes: Virtual product launch reached 5x audience of in-person only.
Training simulator reduced onboarding time by 40%.
Virtual showroom increased engagement and lead quality.

ar.title: Augmented Reality
ar.tagline: AR for retail, training, and marketing
ar.description: We build AR experiences for try-before-you-buy, training, maintenance, and campaigns. Mobile and wearable AR that drives engagement and measurable outcomes.
outcomes: AR try-on increased conversion by 25% for fashion client.
Maintenance AR reduced repair time by 30%.
AR campaign drove 3x engagement vs. static content.

blockchain.title: Blockchain & Cryptography
blockchain.description: We design and build blockchain-based solutions: smart contracts, tokens, DeFi protocols, and enterprise DLT. From Ethereum and L2s to private chains, we deliver secure, auditable systems.
outcomes: NFT platform processed 100K+ mints in first month.
Supply chain pilot reduced fraud and improved traceability.
Token launch and vesting contracts audited and deployed.
blockchain.caseStudyTitle: NFT platform: 100K+ mints in first month

game-development.title: Game Development
game-development.tagline: Full-cycle game dev for multiple platforms
game-development.description: We build games for mobile, PC, and console: design, art, programming, and live ops. From hyper-casual to mid-core, we help studios ship and scale hit titles.
outcomes: Mobile title reached 1M+ downloads in first quarter.
Multiplayer game sustained 50K DAU with our backend.
Port from PC to mobile completed in 3 months.
game-development.caseStudyTitle: Mobile title hits 1M+ downloads in first quarter

web3-gaming.title: Web3 Gaming
web3-gaming.description: We build play-to-earn and Web3 games: tokenomics, NFTs, marketplaces, and on-chain logic. We combine solid game design with secure, scalable blockchain integration.
outcomes: Web3 game integrated NFTs and marketplace; 10K+ MAU.
Play-to-earn economy balanced and sustained over 12 months.
Cross-chain bridge and staking went live without security issues.
web3-gaming.caseStudyTitle: Web3 game: 10K+ MAU with NFT marketplace

arvr-gaming.title: AR/VR/XR Gaming
arvr-gaming.tagline: Immersive gaming with VR, AR, and XR
arvr-gaming.description: We create VR, AR, and mixed-reality game experiences for headsets and mobile. From concept to store submission, we handle performance, comfort, and platform requirements.
outcomes: VR title approved on Quest store; 4.5★ rating.
AR game partnered with major brand for campaign.
XR training module adopted by 20+ enterprises.
arvr-gaming.caseStudyTitle: VR title approved on Quest: 4.5★ rating

gaming-art.title: Gaming Art & Design
gaming-art.tagline: Concept art, 3D assets, and game UI
gaming-art.description: We provide game art and design: concept art, characters, environments, 3D assets, animation, and UI/UX for games. Style-flexible and optimized for real-time engines.
outcomes: Full art pipeline delivered for 3 titles in 18 months.
Game UI redesign improved retention by 15%.
Character art package reduced external dependency by 80%.
gaming-art.caseStudyTitle: Full art pipeline for 3 titles in 18 months

qa.title: Quality Assurance
qa.description: We deliver manual and automated testing, performance testing, and quality engineering. We integrate with your CI/CD and help you ship with confidence.
outcomes: Regression suite automated; release cycle cut from 2 weeks to 3 days.
Load testing found and fixed bottlenecks before launch.
Defect escape rate reduced by 60% with new processes.
qa.caseStudyTitle: Regression automated: release cycle 2 weeks to 3 days

saas.title: SaaS
saas.tagline: Build and scale SaaS with security and compliance
saas.description: We design and build multi-tenant SaaS products: subscription, billing, security, and scalability. From MVP to enterprise, we help you grow with confidence.
outcomes: SaaS MVP launched in 4 months; 1K paying users in 6.
Enterprise tier added with SSO and audit logs.
SOC 2 readiness achieved with our architecture and processes.
saas.caseStudyTitle: SaaS MVP to 1K paying users in 6 months

cloud-migration.title: Cloud Migration & Cloud Ops
cloud-migration.tagline: Migrate to cloud and run with confidence
cloud-migration.description: We plan and execute lift-and-shift, refactor, and rearchitect migrations to AWS, Azure, or GCP. We also provide ongoing cloud operations and optimization.
outcomes: 50+ workloads migrated to Azure in 6 months with zero data loss.
Post-migration optimization reduced spend by 30%.
Disaster recovery tested and documented; RTO under 4 hours.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.tagline: Design, build, and grow online retail
ecommerce.description: We deliver e-commerce solutions: Shopify, custom platforms, marketplaces, and headless. From design and development to maintenance and automation, we help you sell more.
outcomes: Pakistan furniture leader's Shopify migration drove 55% growth.
Fashion resale platform scaled to 100K monthly transactions.
B2B portal reduced order errors by 80%.
ecommerce.caseStudyTitle: Pakistan Furniture Leader's Shopify Migration Drives 55% Growth

salesforce.title: Salesforce
salesforce.tagline: CRM, custom apps, and the Salesforce ecosystem
salesforce.description: We implement and extend Salesforce: Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud, and custom apps on the platform. Integrations, automation, and long-term success.
outcomes: Sales Cloud rollout unified 5 regions; visibility and forecasting improved.
Service Cloud cut average handle time by 25%.
Custom app on Salesforce replaced legacy tool; license savings 40%.
